{'player_information': {'HP': '100/100', 'action_point': '100/100', 'player_current_status': 'normal', 'thirst_satisfied': '90/100', 'package_weight': '5/20', 'player_current_action': 'eat bread', 'cash': 0, 'transportation': []}, 'environment_information': {'Current location': 'end of road', 'Front': 'brick building', 'Back': 'forest', 'Right hand side': 'forest', 'Left hand side': 'forest', 'landscape Features': ['small stream'], 'items': ['key', 'key', 'key']}, 'information_need_to_be_described': {'player_current_action': 'eat bread', 'comsumed_items': {'items_name': 'bread', 'weight': 1, 'item_energy_recovery': 15, 'freshness': -30, 'eatable': False, 'thirst': -20}, 'description_target': ['player current action', 'player current feeling']}}

{'title_of_description': 'comsumed uneatable bread', 'description': 'You are trying to have a slice of stale bread. The bread is dry and hard, makes you longing for a refreshing drink to relieve the parched feeling in your mouth. Its taste is a blend of mustiness and decay, assaulting your palate with a bitter, stale flavor that lingers uncomfortably on your tongue. Your stomach churns uncomfortably, protesting against the foreign and indigestible substance. Despite its staleness, you devour it hungrily, to replenish your energy. '}

{'title_of_description': 'Revitalizing with Mushroom Soup', 'description': 'You are taking a moment to savor a hearty meal of mushroom soup. As you relish each spoonful, the savory aroma fills the air, revitalizing your senses and replenishing your energy. With each sip, your thirst is quenched, and a newfound vigor courses through your veins. '}

{'title_of_description': 'Grassland', 'description': 'You are walking at the middle of a vast grassland. To the back, and right-hand side, you see more endless fields of grass. On your front and left-hand side, there is a patch of land. The landscape is dominated by the lush green grass all around you. 
There is a piece of wood lying on the ground here.'}
